fields.description:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Compile Urban Airship 
2. Launch Application

Actual Result:
Get the license violation page

Expected Result:
Should not get the license violation alert if the account is licensed to use modules
fields.summary: Android: Ti.Verify is giving the license violation alert even when the account is licensed to use modules

comments.body: Tested with TiStudio and TiDev with May 31 2011 17:35 r5aa431bc on emulator and Droid
